PaymentTerm.name: PaymentTerm
PaymentTerm.description: Represents an agreement between a buyer and a seller about when payment is due for an invoice.

Description.description: Additional details about the payment term.

IsDefault.description: Required. Indicates whether the payment term is the default term for your Salesforce org (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate field is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: Required. The name of the payment term. This name appears on the invoice.

Status.description: Required. Specifies whether the payment term is available for use on invoices.
